value:
$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|Where...am I?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Askr... I will kill Askr...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Kill Askr...
Kill Askr...
Kill...$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo200,255,255,255,255|$Fi200|Who...is in...my head?
Get...out...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Brother?$k$pThe voice... My head... It hurts...
Be quiet!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|She's gone! Did Princess Veronica
enter the Tempest?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Yes. We must save the Veronica
that is imprisoned within.$k$pAlfonse, Sharena... Please, lend me
your strength.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|Zacharias...$k$pOf course.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|Oh, how nice! It's like old times,
adventuring with you!$k$pI've gotten quite a bit better since
those days. Take a good look!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|It is nice, isn't it? To be together
again like this...$k$pWe haven't fought side by side in
a long time, friend. And this time, we
have $Nu, too.$k$pLet's move out!$k$p

$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Uhnn... Brother?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|It's all right now, Veronica.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|There's nothing to worry about now,
Princess.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Alfonse, Sharena,
$Nu...
Thank you.$k$pOnce again, you've come to our
rescue. But I must repeat my tired
old line... It's time for me to go.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_SpringFes18,Face|Must you?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Come now, Sharena. You know I
can't delay.$k$pThe longer I stay with you, the
chance that I might slaughter you
grows more real...$k$pThanks to my cursed Emblian blood.$k$pAskr and Embla are gods...and gods
cannot be defied.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|That's not true.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|What?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|If Embla is evil...and brings nothing
but torment to you...$k$pThen we will defeat that god.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Defeat Embla? Impossible... There
is no way.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|The gods of our realms are dragons...
It is true that they are much more
powerful than we are.$k$pThat said, they are not almighty.
There must be a way to defeat them.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|You never change. All you see is a
lofty goal, even if you lack the means
to achieve it...$k$pThe idea that gods would fall by the
hand of man is a fantasy...and a
preposterous one.$k$pThis is a goal that even our
ancestors Líf and Thrasir
could not achieve.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|Still!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Yet it is you that says this, dear
friend, and so I must consider it.$k$pI see the faith reflected in your eyes.
Perhaps it is possible...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_SpringFes18,Face|I have no doubt.$k$pAnd when we do it...will you
return to us?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|I swear it.$k$p
